Post

OMOP data quality assessment

Posted Mar 13, 2024 Updated Mar 16, 2024
By Xiaoqian Jiang 1 min read

  1. DataQualityDashboard - A package designed to run data quality checks against an OMOP CDM instance to improve data quality standards in observational data science. Visit Repository.

  2. Data-Quality-Analysis - Helps in conducting data quality assessments on clinical datasets modeled using the OMOP common data model. Visit Repository.

  3. DQUEEN_OMOP_CDM_Version - Aims to expose and evaluate OMOP-CDM and metadata for data quality assessment. Visit Repository.
